body:
### Introduction

This project is to share presentation slides of "CSS Test Infrastructure" and "File the Best Bug" sessions for Test the Web Forward at Beijing (http://testthewebforward.org/beijing-2012.html) based on reveal.js (https://github.com/hakimel/reveal.js) project.

### css-test-infrastructure

Slide of "CSS Test Infrastructure" by Fu, Elva <elva.fu@intel.com>.

### file-good-bug

Slide of "File the Best Bug" by Zhang, Zhiqiang <zhiqiang.zhang@intel.com>
name: TTWFB
tagline: Presentations for Test the Web Forward at Beijing
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
